archimate:BusinessObject.name: AppliedCustomerPenaltyCharge
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: The AppliedCustomerPenaltyCharge is a type of AppliedCustomerBillingCharge. It represents penalty charges such as late fees, payment rejection fees, interests, that could be applied, linked to dunning of a due amount, in order to bill the customer according to contractual terms and conditions.
